;Congratulatory letter

;

;On the occasion of the 70th anniversary of the establishment of the All-China Federation of Industry and Commerce , on behalf of the Party Central Committee, I would like to extend warm congratulations to you! I would like to extend my sincere greetings to all the cadres and workers of the Federation of Industry and Commerce system and the vast number of private economic people across the country!

;

;The work of the Federation of Industry and Commerce is an important part of the party’s united front work and economic work. Over the past 70 years, the Federation of Industry and Commerce has always adhered to the party's leadership, focused on serving the party and the country's central work, and made important contributions in the great practice of building a new China, advancing reform and opening up, and forging ahead into a new era.

;

;We hope that the Federation of Industry and Commerce will thoroughly study and implement the Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era and the spirit of the 20th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, earnestly shoulder the mission and tasks entrusted by the Party in the new era and new journey, and strengthen ideological and political guidance and promote non-public ownership. ;

;Xi Jinping    

;

;October 24, 2023  

;

; (Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, October 24) & nbsp; , President Xi Jinping, Chairman of the Central Military Commission, sent a congratulatory letter, extending warm congratulations on behalf of the Party Central Committee, and extending sincere greetings to all cadres and workers in the Federation of Industry and Commerce system and the vast number of private economic people across the country.

;

;Xi Jinping pointed out in his congratulatory letter that the work of the Federation of Industry and Commerce is an important part of the party’s united front work and economic work. Over the past 70 years, the Federation of Industry and Commerce has always adhered to the party's leadership, focused on serving the party and the country's central work, and made important contributions in the great practice of building a new China, advancing reform and opening up, and forging ahead into a new era.

;

;Xi Jinping hopes that the Federation of Industry and Commerce will thoroughly study and implement the Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era and the spirit of the 20th National Congress of the Party, earnestly shoulder the mission and tasks entrusted by the Party in the new era and new journey, and strengthen ideological and political guidance and promote non-governmental organizations. We must work hard to promote the healthy development of the public economy and the healthy growth of people in the non-public economy, and solidly promote the high-quality development of the private economy, boost confidence, unite people's hearts, unite the majority of private economic people more closely around the party, and constantly create new developments in the development of the Federation of Industry and Commerce. situation. It is hoped that the majority of private economic professionals will effectively implement the new development concept, vigorously promote entrepreneurship, strive to be a model of patriotism, dedication, law-abiding business, entrepreneurship and innovation, and return to society, and contribute to the comprehensive construction of a modern socialist country and the comprehensive promotion of the great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation. (The full text of the congratulatory letter will be issued separately)

;

;The 70th anniversary celebration meeting of the All-China Federation of Industry and Commerce was held in Beijing on the 24th. Wang Huning, member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, attended and delivered a speech. He said that General Secretary Xi Jinping specially sent a congratulatory letter to the 70th anniversary of the establishment of the All-China Federation of Industry and Commerce, affirming the important contributions made by the All-China Federation of Industry and Commerce, clarifying the significance, direction, theme and tasks of the work of the All-China Federation of Industry and Commerce, and raising ardent hopes for the majority of private economic people. and clear requirements, which provide a fundamental basis for doing a good job in the work of the Federation of Industry and Commerce in the new era and promoting the healthy development of the private economy. We must study and understand it carefully and implement it well.

;

;Wang Huning said that the Federation of Industry and Commerce is a people's organization and chamber of commerce organization led by the party, and the cause of the Federation of Industry and Commerce is an important part of the cause of the party and the country. On the new journey, the Federation of Industry and Commerce must be guided by Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era, fully implement the spirit of the 20th National Congress of the Communist Party of China, firmly grasp the central tasks of the party and the country in the new era and new journey, and adhere to trust, unity, service, and guidance. , education policy, closely focus on the work of promoting "two health", perform duties and responsibilities for the comprehensive construction of a modern socialist country. It is necessary to strengthen ideological and political guidance, guide the majority of private economic professionals to unswervingly listen to and follow the Party, consciously be models of patriotism, dedication, law-abiding business, entrepreneurship and innovation, and return to society, and become qualified builders of socialism with Chinese characteristics. It is necessary to promote the high-quality development of the private economy, guide private enterprises to completely, accurately and comprehensively implement the new development concept, actively participate in building a new development pattern, stick to the main business and strengthen the industry. It is necessary to guide the majority of private economic professionals to practice people-centered development ideas and promote private enterprises to fulfill their social responsibilities and better benefit the people. It is necessary to adhere to political construction, unite to establish the association, serve to rejuvenate the association, reform and strengthen the association, always maintain and enhance the political, advanced and mass nature, and better play the role of bridge and assistant of the Federation of Industry and Commerce.

;

;Shi Taifeng, member of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and director of the United Front Work Department of the CPC Central Committee, read Xi Jinping’s congratulatory letter at the meeting. Hao Mingjin, Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress and Chairman of the Central Committee of the Democratic National Construction Association, and Xu Liuping, Secretary of the Party Leadership Group and First Secretary of the Secretariat of the All-China Federation of Trade Unions, successively delivered congratulatory messages on behalf of the central committees of democratic parties and people's organizations.

;

;Liu Guozhong, member of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee and Vice Premier of the State Council, Zheng Jianbang, vice chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress and chairman of the Central Committee of the Kuomintang, and Wang Yong, vice chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference, attended the conference. Gao Yunlong, Vice Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference and Chairman of the All-China Federation of Industry and Commerce, presided over the conference.

;

;The conference commended the advanced collectives and advanced workers of the Federation of Industry and Commerce system.

;

;Before the meeting, Wang Huning and other leading comrades met with members of the leadership team of the All-China Federation of Industry and Commerce, as well as commended advanced collective representatives and advanced workers of the Federation of Industry and Commerce system.

;

;Responsible comrades of relevant departments of central and state agencies and relevant people's organizations, central leaders of all democratic parties, relevant responsible comrades and representatives of the Federation of Industry and Commerce system, commended advanced collective representatives and advanced workers of the Federation of Industry and Commerce system, Representatives of private economic persons attended the conference.

;

;Xi Jinping emphasized that in the new era, we will give new connotation to the concept of amity, sincerity, mutual benefit and inclusiveness, carry forward Asian values ​​with peace, cooperation, tolerance and integration as the core, and contribute to regional unity, openness and progress. China will continue to practice the concept of amity, sincerity, mutual benefit and inclusiveness, work with regional countries to build an Asian homeland of peace, tranquility, prosperity, beauty, and friendship and coexistence, and jointly write a new chapter in promoting the construction of a community with a shared future for Asia and a community with a shared future for mankind!

;

;An international seminar to commemorate the 10th anniversary of the proposal of the concept of amity, sincerity, mutual benefit and inclusiveness in neighboring diplomacy was held in Beijing on the same day, with the theme of "Amity, Sincerity, Benefit and Inclusion: New Connotation  New Development  New Vision". ;Bishkek of this newspaper on October 24 Japan News    (Reporter Wang Di) At the invitation of Prime Minister Zhaparov of the Kyrgyz Republic, Premier Li Qiang left Beijing on a chartered flight on the afternoon of October 24 and went to the Kyrgyz Republic to attend the Council of Heads of Government (Prime Ministers) of the Member States of the Shanghai Cooperation Organization 22nd meeting and an official visit to the Kyrgyz Republic. ;On the afternoon of the 24th local time, Li Qiang’s charter flight arrived at Bishkek Manas International Airport. Prime Minister Zhaparov and senior government officials went to the airport to greet him. Chinese Ambassador to Kyrgyzstan Du Dewen also went to the airport to greet him.

Li Qiang said that since the establishment of diplomatic relations, China and Kyrgyzstan have persisted in working together, helping each other, and achieving mutual benefit and win-win results. Cooperation in various fields has yielded fruitful results, and international cooperation has been close and efficient. China and Kyrgyzstan are truly good neighbors, good friends, good partners, and good brothers. My visit to Kyrgyzstan this time is to enhance mutual trust, expand cooperation, deepen friendship and promote peace. China is willing to work with Kyrgyzstan to fully implement the important consensus reached by the two heads of state, continuously deepen political and strategic mutual trust, create more new highlights and new benchmarks for cooperation, and give China-Kyrgyzstan friendship more contemporary connotations. China also looks forward to working with SCO member states to carry forward the "Shanghai Spirit" and inject new momentum into regional peace, stability and development.

;

;Zhaparov warmly welcomed Li Qiang’s visit to Kyrgyzstan, spoke highly of the positive development momentum of Kyrgyz-China relations, and expressed that Kyrgyzstan is willing to strengthen exchanges with China in various fields, promote the joint construction of the “Belt and Road”, and promote the comprehensive strategies of the two countries. ;

;Wu Zhenglong attended the meeting.

;This newspaper, Beijing, October 24th  (Reporter Huang Qingchang) The Sixth Session of the Standing Committee of the 14th National People's Congress The meeting concluded on the afternoon of the 24th at the Great Hall of the People in Beijing. After voting, the meeting passed the newly revised Marine Environmental Protection Law and the Patriotism Education Law; it was decided to remove Li Shangfu from the posts of State Councilor and Minister of National Defense, remove Qin Gang from the posts of State Councilor, and remove Wang Zhigang from the posts of Minister of Science and Technology. , appointed Yin Hejun as Minister of Science and Technology, removed Liu Kun from the post of Minister of Finance, and appointed Lan Fo'an as Minister of Finance. ;

;162 members of the Standing Committee attended the meeting, and the number of attendees met the quorum.

;

;The meeting voted to adopt the National People’s Congress Standing Committee’s resolution approving the State Council’s issuance of additional treasury bonds and the 2023 central budget adjustment plan, and the 14th National People’s Congress Standing Committee’s resolution authorizing the State Council to issue some new local government debt limits in advance. Decide.

;

;The meeting voted to adopt the decision of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress on ratifying the Treaty between the People's Republic of China and the Republic of Colombia on the Transfer of Sentenced Persons, the decision on ratifying the Extradition Treaty between the People's Republic of China and the Republic of Mauritius, Decision to ratify the Protocol against the Illicit Manufacturing of and Trafficking in Firearms, Their Parts and Components and Ammunition, supplementing the United Nations Convention against Transnational Organized Crime, ratification of the Secretariat of the Conference on Interaction and Confidence-Building Measures in Asia and its personnel, and the privileges of representatives of member states and the Immunity Convention, and the decision to join the International Convention on Aids to Navigation and Navigation.

;

Report on the results of the review.

;The meeting voted to remove Li Shangfu from his position as a member of the Central Military Commission.

;

;The meeting voted to appoint Liu Shaoyun as the president of the Chinese People's Liberation Army Military Court.

;

;The meeting also voted on other appointments and dismissals.

;

;Vice Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress Li Hongzhong, Wang Dongming, Xiao Jie, Zheng Jianbang, Ding Zhongli, Hao Mingjin, Cai Dafeng, He Wei, Wu Weihua, Tiening, Peng Qinghua, Zhang Qingwei, Luosang Jiangcun, Xue Keleti Zha Kerr and Secretary-General Liu Qi attended the meeting.

;

;Vice Premier of the State Council Zhang Guoqing, President of the Supreme People's Court Zhang Jun, responsible comrades of the National Supervisory Commission and the Supreme People's Procuratorate, members of the special committees of the National People's Congress, responsible comrades of the Standing Committees of the People's Congresses of various provinces, autonomous regions and municipalities, some deputy provincial governors The main responsible comrades of the Standing Committee of the Municipal People's Congress, some National People's Congress deputies, and responsible comrades of relevant departments attended the meeting.

;

;After the closing meeting, the Standing Committee of the 14th National People's Congress held the seventh special lecture, chaired by Chairman Zhao Leji. Li Chunlin, member of the Party Leadership Group and Deputy Director of the National Development and Reform Commission, gave a lecture titled "Accelerating the Planning and Construction of a New Energy System Guided by Xi Jinping Thought on Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era".

;; Wed, 25 Oct 2023 06:26:05 +0800 01版要闻 - 中国经济具有巨大韧性和潜力http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-10/25/nw.D110000renmrb_20231025_6-01.htm
;Wednesday, October 25, 2023
; ;

;A correct understanding of the current economic situation is the foundation for us to do a solid job in economic work. Recently, the economic data for the third quarter were released, which showed that China's economic recovery has become more obvious. The main engine of world economic growth is strong and resilient.

;

;“Our economy has huge development resilience and potential”, “the fundamentals of long-term good development have not changed, and the development prospects are bright” and “China’s economic ship will continue to move forward despite the wind and waves.” Since the beginning of this year, Comrade Xi Jinping has been the leader. The core Party Central Committee has made a series of strategic judgments on my country's economic situation, which plays an important guiding role in our comprehensive, dialectical and accurate understanding of the general trend of economic development. It also conveys to the world China's firm confidence in united struggle and courageous advancement.

;

;Confidence comes from a dialectical understanding of economic fundamentals. To objectively look at the overall situation of China's economic operation, we must look at both speed and quality. Since the beginning of this year, our country’s economy has withstood the downward pressure brought by external risk challenges and multiple domestic factors, and its growth has stabilized and rebounded. In the first three quarters, my country's GDP grew by 5.2% year-on-year, ranking among the best among the world's major economies. It is particularly important to point out that the year-on-year growth rate in the third quarter was 4.9%, which was slightly lower than that in the second quarter. This was mainly affected by the base number last year. If the base effect is deducted, the two-year average growth rate in the third quarter of this year is 4.4%, which is 1.1 percentage points faster than the two-year average growth rate in the second quarter. In addition, the quarter-on-quarter growth rate in the third quarter was also 0.8 percentage points faster than that in the second quarter. There is inertia in the economic operation, and we believe that the trend of stabilization and recovery will remain in the fourth quarter. While growth continues to recover, my country's prices are generally stable, the employment situation has improved, foreign trade is better than expected, corporate profit growth has improved, and high-quality development has been solidly advanced. Facts have proved that in the complex and severe external environment of sluggish world economic recovery and still high global inflation, the Chinese economy has demonstrated strong resilience, potential and vitality, and remains the ballast and stabilizer of global economic growth.

;

;Confidence comes from an accurate grasp of the laws of development. It is advisable to take a long-term view and observe the Chinese economy, which is inseparable from historical thinking and historical perspective. Judging from international experience, after the economy reaches a certain scale, industrial upgrading and transformation and development are generally accompanied by a slowdown in growth. As the world's second largest economy, China's total economic output exceeded 120 trillion yuan last year, and the increment corresponding to each one percentage point increase is roughly equivalent to 2.1 percentage points 10 years ago. From the perspective of development history, China's economy has always developed by overcoming challenges, grown by ups and downs, and grown stronger by going through trials. Especially since the new era, in the face of the dangers of fording the beach, the difficulties of climbing mountains, and the difficulties of breaking through obstacles, we have responded calmly and worked hard. The cause of the party and the country has made historic achievements and undergone historic changes, and has made strides forward in high-quality development. , my country’s economic strength achieved a historic leap. As General Secretary Xi Jinping emphasized, "When are there no difficulties? One by one, every year is good, and every year is good. This has been the case for the Chinese nation for more than 5,000 years. The key to overcoming obstacles is to boost confidence."

;

;Confidence comes from a deep insight into the superiority of the system. Since the beginning of this year, under the strong leadership of the Party Central Committee with Comrade Xi Jinping at its core, all regions and departments have better coordinated domestic and international situations, better coordinated epidemic prevention and control and economic and social development, and better coordinated development and security. We have created The most populous country in the history of human civilization has successfully emerged from the miracle of the epidemic. my country's economy is developing in waves and twists and turns, with obvious momentum of consumption upgrading, enhanced regional coordination momentum, and continuous release of innovation vitality. This fully demonstrates that the decision-making and deployment of the Party Central Committee with Comrade Xi Jinping as the core on economic work is completely correct, and fully demonstrates our party’s superb wisdom and skillful ability to control the socialist market economy in a complex and changeable situation. Facing the future, we must fully, accurately and comprehensively implement the new development concept, firmly grasp the primary task of high-quality development and the strategic task of building a new development pattern, proactively adapt to and lead a new round of scientific and technological revolution and industrial transformation, and accelerate the realization of high-level scientific and technological progress. Being self-reliant and self-reliant, and implementing a series of strategic deployments of the Party Central Committee on scientific and technological innovation, we are fully capable of continuously shaping new drivers of development and new advantages, and firmly grasping the initiative in development.

;

;Unity is strength, and confidence is worth more than gold. The fundamentals of China's long-term economic growth have not changed and will not change. Strengthening self-confidence, cultivating a normal mind, stimulating enterprising spirit, and concentrating on doing our own things well are the keys to overcoming various risks and challenges. Accurately grasp the analysis and judgment of the Party Central Committee on the current economic situation, invigorate our spirits, unite our efforts, continue to climb over obstacles, overcome difficulties, muster the spirit of entrepreneurial spirit, and form a good situation in which we will pay close attention to implementation. ;“今年是习近平主席提出共建'一带一路'倡议10周年。这一倡议通过加强基础设施建设、贸易投资、文化交流和人员往来等，将许多国家紧密联系在一起，成为造福全人类的重要倡议。”泰国总理赛塔日前在来华出席第三届“一带一路”国际合作高峰论坛并进行正式访问期间接受了本报记者专访。他高度评价泰中两国合作取得丰硕成果，表示在共建“一带一路”框架下，“泰中两国合作前景广阔”。

;

;赛塔表示，习近平主席在本届高峰论坛开幕式上的主旨演讲传递了中国坚持和平发展、扩大开放的信号。“习近平主席温文尔雅、平易近人，对邻国以诚相待，让人感觉十分暖心。”赛塔认为，共建“一带一路”倡议已成为连接全球不同国家的纽带。本届高峰论坛上，多国领导人齐聚一堂，阐述各自国家发展计划，展现了各方继续携手共建“一带一路”的承诺和决心。

;

;赛塔说，中国是泰国最大的贸易伙伴，共建“一带一路”对于泰中经贸合作十分重要。赛塔今年9月就任泰国总理后，曾前往泰国东北部廊开地区考察泰中老三国铁路连接情况。他认为，经由泰中老铁路连接获得的中转地位，将极大推动廊开发展。他还以泰中铁路建设为例说，这条铁路是两国务实合作的旗舰项目，铁路建成后将推动区域互联互通，增强企业对泰国投资环境信心。

;

;随着共建“一带一路”不断推进，许多中国新能源汽车企业前往泰国投资建厂。赛塔认为，这将助力泰国实现全球电动汽车制造中心的愿景。在他看来，泰中两国在农业领域也拥有巨大合作潜力。他以榴莲出口为例说：“我知道很多中国民众喜欢吃榴莲，将来泰国可以向中国出口更多、更高品质的榴莲。”

;

;“泰中友好源远流长，两国人民像亲友一样互相支持。”赛塔表示，中国是泰国最大的游客来源国，从9月25日起，泰国政府面向中国游客实施为期约5个月的免签政策。“免签等政策有助于促进泰中民间交往，为两国进一步深化务实合作打下坚实基础。”

;

;出席高峰论坛相关活动期间，赛塔还与多位中国企业负责人洽谈。“我这次来就是向中国传递一个信号：泰国已准备好迎接来自中国的投资者。”赛塔表示，“中国市场广阔，潜力巨大，泰国具有良好的营商环境，希望与更多中国企业合作共建'一带一路'项目。泰中合作大有可为。”

;本报北京10月24日电  （记者龚鸣、赵益普、郭梓云）纪念亲诚惠容周边外交理念提出10周年国际研讨会24日在京举行。中共中央政治局委员、中央外办主任王毅首先宣读了习近平主席书面致辞。

;

;王毅说，10年前，习近平主席提出亲诚惠容周边外交理念。 10年来，亲诚惠容从理念到行动，从愿景到现实，思想内涵不断丰富，实践效果持续显现，为亚洲友好合作、团结振兴注入了强大动力，为构建人类命运共同体提供了有益镜鉴。

;

;王毅强调，亚洲的未来，关键在做好自己的事情。亚洲的振兴，关键在地区国家团结奋斗。中国正在以中国式现代化全面推进中华民族伟大复兴，必将为世界各国特别是亚洲邻国带来持久红利，提供更多机遇，注入不竭动力。中方将秉持亲诚惠容理念，深化同周边国家友好合作和利益融合，共同构建和平安宁、繁荣美丽、友好共生的亚洲家园，为构建亚洲命运共同体和人类命运共同体贡献更多智慧和力量。

;

;王毅就此提出四点建议：一是坚持共商共建共享，打造“一带一路”示范区。二是坚持共谋发展，打造全球发展倡议先行区。三是坚持和衷共济，打造全球安全倡议实验区。四是坚持亚洲价值，打造全球文明倡议首善区。

;研讨会由中央外办、外交部共同举办。巴基斯坦参议院主席桑吉拉尼、蒙古国总理奥云额尔登、尼泊尔总理普拉昌达、柬埔寨副首相孙占托、日本前首相福田康夫、韩国前总理李海瓒、吉尔吉斯斯坦前总理博罗诺夫、上海合作组织秘书长张明等以线下或线上方式出席。

;

;研讨会当日还发布了《新时代中国的周边外交政策展望》文件。

;; Wed, 25 Oct 2023 06:26:05 +0800 02版要闻 - 统筹推进履约监管与资源可持续利用http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-10/25/nw.D110000renmrb_20231025_4-02.htm
;2023年10月25日星期三
; ;

;国务院新闻办公室24日发布《中国的远洋渔业发展》白皮书，全面介绍了中国远洋渔业的发展理念、原则立场、政策主张和履约成效，分享中国远洋渔业管理经验，促进远洋渔业国际合作与交流。

;

;中国是世界渔业大国。中国远洋渔业发展情况、重点监管措施和成效如何？如何强化科技支撑？中国远洋渔业对世界渔业有哪些贡献？记者采访了有关负责人和专家，详解公众关心的问题。

;

;;中国统筹推进资源养护和可持续利用;

;

;白皮书指出，中国坚持在发展中保护、在保护中发展，实施公海自主休渔等重要举措，不断强化渔业资源养护，加强生态系统管理，重点关注气候变化与生物多样性养护，推进渔业资源长期可持续利用取得显著成效。

;

;“中国政府采取了比区域渔业管理组织更为严格的措施。”上海海洋大学教授刘小兵举例说，中国政府决定自2024年起所有中国远洋渔船必须每天报送电子渔捞日志。这一措施比大西洋、印度洋和东太平洋的渔捞日志年报的区域管理措施更为严格，有利于获得实时的渔船生产信息，及时了解捕捞配额/限额使用情况。

;

;上海海洋大学海洋科学学院院长陈新军说，为了确保公海鱿鱼资源的可持续利用和科学开发，中国政府对三个国际上没有国际组织管理的公海鱿鱼作业海域进行了自主休渔制度，这是中国政府负责任捕捞的体现和担当。

;

;据了解，中方远洋渔业作业海域中，所有目前尚无区域性渔业管理组织的公海海域均已纳入自主休渔范围。

;

;;中国严格实施远洋渔业监管  强化远洋渔业科技支撑;

;

;中国远洋渔业的持续发展与不断强化的监管措施密不可分。中国渔业主管部门不断强化监管、完善机制、提升能力，促进远洋渔业持续健康发展。

;

;中国远洋渔业协会会长张显良说，中国实施全球最严格的远洋渔船船位监控措施；从2020年开始全面实施远洋渔业公海转载自主监管，落实所有公海转载活动提前申报和事后报告程序，为公海转载运输船逐步配备观察员或安装视频监控系统；严格实施水产品进出口监管，积极履行市场国义务；建立远洋渔业企业履约评估制度，对远洋渔业企业捕捞活动实施严格监管，坚持对违规行为“零容忍”，积极采取立法、行政等措施打击违规捕捞行为，规范企业生产经营活动。

;

;白皮书指出，中国通过开展公海渔业资源科学调查、参与区域渔业管理组织相关研究、改善升级渔船和捕捞装备等举措，不断加强科技创新，促进渔业提质增效、转型升级和高质量发展。《“十四五”全国渔业发展规划》提出，渔业科技进步贡献率努力从2020年的63%提高到2025年的67%。

;

;陈新军说，科学研究是渔业管理决策和渔业治理的基础。我国开展了公海鱿鱼资源评估、鱿钓渔业观察员覆盖率、鱿钓渔业捕捞努力量等方面的研究工作，为公海渔业治理贡献中国智慧和中国方案。

;

;“我们将信息技术、人工智能等现代新技术、新成果应用于公海渔业治理。研发、推广电子渔捞日志系统。”陈新军说，截至2022年底，600多艘鱿钓渔船安装了电子渔捞日志系统并试运行，实现了生产数据从大洋到陆地的实时传输，极大提高了履约能力和时效；研发电子监控系统并开展了船端测试，为“电子观察员”登临远洋鱿钓渔船打下了基础。

;

;;深化国际渔业合作  推动全球渔业可持续发展;

;

;中国渔业发展极大促进了国际交流与合作。据统计，2022年中国水产品进出口总量1023万吨，总额467亿美元，进出口总额再创历史最高，与200多个国家和地区有水产贸易往来。

;

;白皮书说，“十四五”期间及今后一段时期，中国将继续以推动远洋渔业全产业链集聚发展，健全远洋渔业发展支撑体系，提升远洋渔业综合治理能力，加大远洋渔业发展保障力度为重点任务，通过优化产业结构，强化科技支撑，提升监管能力，深入参与国际渔业治理，完善政策体系，努力实现远洋渔业高质量发展。

;

;张显良说，中国渔业发展对全球渔业资源科学养护和可持续利用作出了重要贡献。中国积极发展水产养殖，同时，大力实施减船转产，全面实施海洋渔业资源总量管理制度，实现内陆七大流域、四大海域休禁渔制度全覆盖，实施长江“十年禁渔”，建设海洋牧场和水生生物保护区，养护水生生物资源和生态系统，保护濒危物种，维护世界水生生物多样性。

;

;张显良说，经过30多年的发展，中国远洋渔业取得了令人瞩目的发展成就。未来，中国远洋渔业将继续坚持绿色可持续发展道路，优化产业结构，推进转型升级，提高质量效益，严控发展规模，强化规范管理，打击非法捕捞，致力于科学养护和可持续利用渔业资源，努力实现远洋渔业高质量发展。

;
